sentences.en: At Google, we have a saying: " launch early and iterate. "
sentences.cn: 在谷歌, 我们有个说法: “ 尽早更新,多多申明. ”

sentences.en: If so, it must iterate the entire invocation list.
sentences.cn: 如果是, 它必须迭代整个调用列表.

sentences.en: In modeling, there are ways you can iterate towards the right solution.
sentences.cn: 关于建模, 以下方法能让你一直朝着正确的解决方法前进.

sentences.en: Iterators iterate through the container in an arbitrary order, that can change as elements are inserted.
sentences.cn: 迭代器按任意顺序遍历容器, 由元素被插入时还可能改变.

sentences.en: Iterators iterate through the container in the order defined by the comparison object.
sentences.cn: 迭代器按照由比较函数对象所定义的顺序遍历容器.

sentences.en: Will you repeat that question, please?
sentences.cn: 请你重复一下那个问题,好吗?iterate 系 正式用语,指“一次或数次地重述” 、 “反复申说”,如:

words.tran_cn: [数] 迭代的；重复的，反复的

trans.tran_cn: 反复说, 重申, 重述
trans.tran_en: to say or do something again
